dict.acceptation: 测量，测度；措施；程度；尺寸；
测量；测量（大小，容量，尺寸等）；

sent.orig: The tentative idea of the first part and measure divide provisionality measure and long-term measure.
sent.trans: 第一部分的设想和措施分临时性措施和长期措施。

sent.orig: It is used to normal precise measure and measure equipment, temperature compensation of transistor circuit.
sent.trans: 用于一般精度的温度测量和在计量设备，晶体管电路中的温度补偿。

sent.orig: Can measure frequency and cycle. 8846A still can measure capacitance and temperature.
sent.trans: 能够测量频率和周期。8846A还能够测量电容和温度。

sent.orig: Memory function can store or call measure a setting, measure data and user definition value.
sent.trans: 存储性能可存储或挪用测量设置，测量数据和用户界说值。

sent.orig: Made to Measure: All dresses are made to measure.
sent.trans: 标准制作：所有的服饰都按照标准制作。
